    • Method Detail

      • totalToPay

        public static double totalToPay(double[] materialPrice,
                                double[] materialQuantity,
                                int ubication)
        Returns the amount of money that must be paid when the products are bought only in a certain hardware store
        pre:
        post: The amount of money to be paid is calculated from the prices of the materials, the quantity, and the location of the residence
        Parameters:
        materialPrice - Set of prices of a certain hardware store for the materials to be used. materialPrice != null.
        materialQuantity - Set of quantities for previously determined types of materials. materialQuantity != null.
        ubication - Value that indicates the place of the dwelling, it is a number between 1 and 3. ubication != null.
        Returns:
        total

      • storeBestPrice

        public static java.lang.String[] storeBestPrice(double[] homecenterMaterialPrice,
                                                double[] delCentroMaterialPrice,
                                                double[] delBarrioMaterialPrice)
        Returns an array of String with the name of the hardware store with the best unit price for a certain material
        pre:
        post: The name of the hardware store with the best price for each specific material is found from the price arrays of the 3 possible hardware stores
        Parameters:
        HomecenterMaterialPrice - Price set from the HomeCenter hardware store for materials to be used. HomeCenterMaterialPrice != Null.
        delCentroMaterialPrice - Set of prices of the hardware store of the center for the materials to be used. delCentroMaterialPrice != null.
        delBarrioMaterialPrice - Set of prices from the neighborhood hardware store for the materials to be used. delBarrioMaterialPrice != null.
        Returns:
        storeBestPrice

      • bestPriceValue

        public static double[] bestPriceValue(double[] homecenterMaterialPrice,
                                      double[] delCentroMaterialPrice,
                                      double[] delBarrioMaterialPrice)
        Returns an array of double with the best unit price for a given material
        pre:
        post: The best unit price for a certain material is found from the price arrays of the 3 possible hardware stores
        Parameters:
        HomecenterMaterialPrice - Price set from the HomeCenter hardware store for materials to be used. HomeCenterMaterialPrice != Null.
        delCentroMaterialPrice - Set of prices of the hardware store of the center for the materials to be used. delCentroMaterialPrice != null.
        delBarrioMaterialPrice - Set of prices from the neighborhood hardware store for the materials to be used. delBarrioMaterialPrice != null.
        Returns:
        bestPriceValue

      • bestPriceTotal

        public static double bestPriceTotal(double[] bestPriceValue,
                                    int ubication,
                                    double[] materialQuantity)
        Returns the value that must be paid when the best prices for materials are chosen
        pre:
        post: The value is found from the array of best prices, and the ubication of the dwelling
        Parameters:
        bestPriceValue - Set of the best prices for materials that can be chosen. bestPriceValue != null.
        ubication - Value that indicates the place of the dwelling, it is a number between 1 and 3. ubication <= 3 && ubication> = 1. param materialQuantity Set of quantities for the materials given. materialQuantity != null.
        Returns:
        total

      • utilization

        public static java.lang.String[] utilization(java.lang.String[] materialName,
                                             int[] materialUtilization,
                                             int use)
        Returns a set that stores the materials according to their use in the work
        pre:
        post: The set is found from the array of the names of materials, the array of the utilization of materials and an indicator for the clasification that is going to be used
        Parameters:
        materialName - Array of String that stores the names of the materials. materialName != null.
        materialUtilization - Array of int from 1 to 3 that stores the utilization of the materials. utilization != null
        use - Value that indicates for what work is this size reservation going to be made, number 1 means rough construction, number 2 means final construction, number 3 means painting. use >= 1 && use <= 3
        Returns:
        size
